price: 28. The best among them said: "Did I not tell you: why say you not: Inshâ’ Allâh (If Allâh wills)."
arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ
